Package com.deliveryCompany.components

Class MainOffice

java.lang.Object
com.deliveryCompany.components.MainOffice
public class MainOffice
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a main office that creates the branches of the delivery company, the trucks for the branches and the packages and makes the whole system run according to a clock
Version:
1.00 7 Apr 2021
Author:
Israel Avihail 308298363, Ofir Golan 315585323
See Also:
Branch, Package, Truck

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MainOffice​(int branches, int trucksForBranch)
    Class constructor that creates all the branches and their trucks based on specified number of branches and number of trucks for each branch

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPackage()
    This method adds a package (type and characteristics are random but standard packages are twice more likely to be created)
    java.lang.String clockString()
    This method constructs a string representation of the clock
    static Branch getBranch​(int index)
    This method is for accessing a specific branch by a specified index (id) threwout the system
    static int getClock()
    Get method for the clock field
    static Hub getHub()
    This static get method of the hub is for accessing the hub all over the delivery company system
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> getPackages()
    Get method for packages field
    void play​(int playTime)
    This method makes the clock "tick" a specified number of times (activates a tick of the clock within a loop).
    void printReport()
    This method displays the report of all the packages tracking information
    static void setClock​(int clock)
    set method for the clock field
    void setHub​(Hub hub)
    Set method for hub field according to a specified parameter
    void setPackages​(java.util.ArrayList<Package> packages)
    Set method for the list of packages that are in the delivery company
    void tick()
    This method activates a tick of the clock - displays the current time, advances the clock, creates packages at constant intervals and activates the work of the hub (with in turn will activate it's trucks and the branches work method)

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MainOffice

      public MainOffice​(int branches, int trucksForBranch)
      Class constructor that creates all the branches and their trucks based on specified number of branches and number of trucks for each branch
      Parameters:
      branches - the number of branches to create
      trucksForBranch - the number of trucks each branch will have (a hub has a single non standard truck not included in that number)

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play​(int playTime)
      This method makes the clock "tick" a specified number of times (activates a tick of the clock within a loop). after all the ticks are done a report of the all the packages tracking will be displayed
      Parameters:
      playTime - the specified number of times the clock will tick

    • printReport

      public void printReport()
      This method displays the report of all the packages tracking information

    • clockString

      public java.lang.String clockString()
      This method constructs a string representation of the clock
      Returns:
      a string representation of the clock

    • tick

      public void tick()
      This method activates a tick of the clock - displays the current time, advances the clock, creates packages at constant intervals and activates the work of the hub (with in turn will activate it's trucks and the branches work method)

    • addPackage

      public void addPackage()
      This method adds a package (type and characteristics are random but standard packages are twice more likely to be created)

    • getHub

      public static Hub getHub()
      This static get method of the hub is for accessing the hub all over the delivery company system
      Returns:
      hub the hub of the delivery company

    • setHub

      public void setHub​(Hub hub)
      Set method for hub field according to a specified parameter
      Parameters:
      hub - the specified parameter to set the delivery company's hub

    • getPackages

      public java.util.ArrayList<Package> getPackages()
      Get method for packages field
      Returns:
      the list of packages in the delivery company

    • setPackages

      public void setPackages​(java.util.ArrayList<Package> packages)
      Set method for the list of packages that are in the delivery company
      Parameters:
      packages - the specified list of packages to be set for the delivery company

    • getClock

      public static int getClock()
      Get method for the clock field
      Returns:
      the current clock of the system

    • setClock

      public static void setClock​(int clock)
      set method for the clock field
      Parameters:
      clock - the specified clock to set the system's clock

    • getBranch

      public static Branch getBranch​(int index)
      This method is for accessing a specific branch by a specified index (id) threwout the system
      Parameters:
      index - the index (id) of the branch to get
      Returns:
      the branch with the specified id (index)
